definition: to be gravely mistaken (idiom)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
surname Cuo
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
surname Cuo

sentences.english: If he thinks I’d marry him， he has another think coming.
sentences.chinese: 如果他认为我会跟他结婚，那就大错特错了。

sentences.english: "Don't put all your eggs in one basket." is all wrong.
sentences.chinese: “别把所有的鸡蛋放进一个篮子”之说大错特错。

sentences.english: 'Ask your pardon, sir, you would be very wrong, ' quoth Silver.
sentences.chinese: 请恕我直言，先生，那样你就大错特错了。

sentences.english: Colossal . She looks like a mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 大错特错她看起来像一个邮筒。

sentences.english: But in fact, it has gone terribly wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但事实上，这个文段大错特错。

sentences.english: The stereotype of the unemotional Chinese is not entirely accurate.
sentences.chinese: 认为中国人不易动感情，那是大错特错了。

sentences.english: The wrong is too great to be redressed.
sentences.chinese: 大错特错以致无法补救。

sentences.english: But to claim it is the greenest option is just wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但声称这样做是最环保的选择可就大错特错了。

sentences.english: But what a mistake it would be.
sentences.chinese: 但那将是一个大错特错的决定。

sentences.english: If you think that this isn’t design-related, you are totally wrong.
sentences.chinese: 如果你认为这一点与设计无关，那么你就大错特错了。

sentences.english: Don't play dumb with me. If you think you can fool me, you are sorely mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 别跟我装聋作哑，如果你以为能骗我，就大错特错了。

sentences.english: But if you see it as a simple step-at-a-time procedure, you make a serious mistake.
sentences.chinese: 但如果把它看作为逐步实现的过程，你就大错特错了。

sentences.english: If he thinks that he can suborn me, he is grievously in error.
sentences.chinese: 如果他认为可以收买我，那他就大错特错了。

definition: (Internet slang) to have a simplistic view of sth (transcription of "too young, too simple" – English words spoken by Jiang Zemin 江澤民|江泽民[Jiang1 Ze2 min2] in chastizing Hong Kong reporters in 2000)
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to treat differently/another cup of tea
won't work/will get (you) nowhere
not one good point/everything about it is wrong
little imagined/scarcely realized
to take sth for granted
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
lunatic ravings/nonsense/pipe dream
to be carried away by one's wishful thinking (idiom)/to labor under a delusion/wishful thinking
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
couldn't be better/ideal/wonderful
everything is fine (idiom); all is well with the world
impossible
to do whatever one pleases
provided that/supposing that/if
